trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SEQ_00<tab>Though gripped by sadness, Sphene spurs herself to action.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wayakkwe.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Shale.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Shale again.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Shale once more.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_TODO_04<tab>Clear the way of monstrous intruders.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Shale.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Shale.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_TODO_07<tab>Speak with Shale again.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_KRILE_000_001<tab>I will hold on to Geode's gun... If you could take the soul cell, please...
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_010<tab>We should return to the Backroom. Shale and the others need to know what happened.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_KRILE_000_011<tab>Yes, I'll ask Wayakkwe to meet us there as well.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_020<tab>...
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_GULOOLJA_000_025<tab>I got back control of the sentries...probably around the same time Calyx left. I'm sorry, I couldn't stop him...
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_GRAHATIA_000_030<tab>We made a swift patrol of the other levels, and confirmed that Calyx had carried out a number of targeted attacks. All to harvest more aether, it seems...
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_YSHTOLA_000_035<tab>I assume you know better by now, but I hope you're not planning to try anything alone. We are all here with you.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_ERENVILLE_000_040<tab>I've spoken with Wuk Lamat. They've cut their meeting short to deal with the aftermath of this latest violence.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_GENOLT_000_045<tab>They brought back Geode's gun... Its rounds were spent an' its barrel was scorched, so ye can be sure he went down fightin'.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_ORIGINALSPHENE_000_047<tab>I am told that the members tasked with keeping residents safe returned with the body of their comrade. They all risk so much...
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_WAYAKKWE_000_050<tab>Another comrade gone. Some days it's almost more than I can bear.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_WAYAKKWE_000_051<tab>Geode was... He was an older brother to Nostalgia and me.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_WAYAKKWE_000_052<tab>Shale knew him longer, though, and is surely taking it the hardest. And that's on top of what happened with Cahciua...
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_WAYAKKWE_000_053<tab>Do you think you could check on her? See how she's doing? She's like to put on a brave face if it's me or my sister.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_WAYAKKWE_000_055<tab>Oh, we have Isadora and Milos under guard, so...that's one less thing to worry about.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_060<tab>Apologies. My mind was elsewhere.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_061<tab>We need to press on with the hunt for Calyx, but I can't seem to focus. I should be better than this, I know...
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_A1_000_001<tab>Is there anything I can do?
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_A1_000_002<tab>As you said, you need time to work through it.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_063<tab>You can't help yourself, can you? Still, I appreciate the concern.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_064<tab>You're right. I ought to heed my own words. As it stands, I'm of no use to anyone.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_065<tab>Cahciua used to say the best thing to do with grief was to let it all out.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_066<tab>So, I think I'll take myself over to Earthen Sky and say my good-byes to Geode...
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_067<tab>Why don't you come along? I could use someone to blubber to if you've a shoulder to spare.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_068<tab>Right, then... Let's get out of Everkeep for a bit.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_070<tab>It's a fair trek on foot, so I've arranged for a couple of air-wheelers.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_071<tab>They've had their communications modules removed, so even Calyx shouldn't be able to seize control of them. Say the word, and we'll set off.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_080<tab>Ready? We'll be flying close to the pylons, so follow my lead.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SYSTEM_000_081<tab>Mount the air-wheeler?
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_082<tab>These air-wheelers are Genolt's babies. You won't find a smoother ride in all of Everkeep.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_083<tab>For years now, I've been taking one out for a turn whenever I needed to lighten my mood.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_084<tab>Sometimes Geode would come along, too, and we'd end up racing.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_085<tab>Does that surprise you? Our friendship always had a competitive edge.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_086<tab>We would often talk about how, one day, we might fly our wheelers outside the dome...
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_087<tab>...Almost there. Be sure the ground is clear before you touch down.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_088<tab>Phew... That's helped clear my head a touch.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_089<tab>You know, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you might be the first person I've ridden with who wasn't an Oblivion recruit.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_090<tab>...As far as I remember, at least. The memories from my regulator days aren't exactly reliable.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_091<tab>Come on, let's head inside. Hopefully the way will be clear of pests today...
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_095<tab>Ugh, just our luck...
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_110<tab>Thanks.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_111<tab>We can usually avoid such encounters, but sometimes they wander in and block the only path.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_112<tab>Not that it slowed you down at all. I've never seen you fight up close before, and the surveillance feed clearly didn't do it justice.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_113<tab>Ahem. Hopefully that keeps the route clear for a while. Shall we?
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_130<tab>...I appreciate you helping me through this.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_131<tab>And not only the grief. You've helped me see that my comrades mean even more to me than I realized.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_132<tab>Which only fuels my determination...
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_133<tab>I'll be spending every waking moment working to bring Calyx to account for his crimes.
TEXT_KINGMI103_05366_SHALE_000_134<tab>I'll do my part, then you do yours. Oblivion needs you.
